channel.title: CVE Feed for Unknown -- Popup Manager
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Unknown -- Popup Manager

item.title: CVE-2022-4124|2024-08-03T01:27:54.486Z -- unknown -- popup%20manager
item.description: The Popup Manager WordPress plugin through 1.6.6 does not have authorisation and CSRF checks when deleting popups, which could allow unauthenticated users to delete them

item.title: CVE-2022-4125|2024-08-03T01:27:54.511Z -- unknown -- popup%20manager
item.description: The Popup Manager WordPress plugin through 1.6.6 does not have authorisation and CSRF check when creating/updating popups, and is missing sanitisation as well as escaping, which could allow unauthenticated attackers to create arbitrary popups and add Stored XSS payloads as well
